snippet: Maj. Nidal Malik Hasan, the Army psychiatrist sentenced to death for the Fort Hood shootings, has been forcibly shaved, an Army spokesman said.
abstract: Maj Nidal Malik Hasan, Army psychiatrist sentenced to death for Fort Hood shootings, is forcibly shaved because his beard violates Army grooming rules.
lead_paragraph: Maj. Nidal Malik Hasan, the Army psychiatrist sentenced to death for the Fort Hood shootings, has been forcibly shaved, an Army spokesman said.

headline.main: Fort Hood Killer Is Forcibly Shaved
headline.print_headline: Fort Hood Killer Is Forcibly Shaved
